AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Headband of Intellect
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Your Intelligence score is 19 while you wear this headband. It has no effect on you if your Intelligence is 19 or higher without it.

MagicProperty.Name: Headband of Intellect
MagicProperty.Description: Your Intelligence score is 19 while you wear this headband. It has no effect on you if your Intelligence is 19 or higher without it.
